pkgmetadata.longdescription: graphql-py==========.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/ivelum/graphql-py.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/ivelum/graphql-pyGraphQL lexer and parser written in pure Python, produces AST. Features:* Complies with latest `working draft of GraphQL specification`_;* Fast enough, built on `PLY`_;* Tested vs. Python 2.7, 3.4 - 3.9, and PyPy.. _working draft of GraphQL specification: https://facebook.github.io/graphql/.. _PLY: http://www.dabeaz.com/ply/Installation------------.. code:: shell $ pip install graphql-pyUsage-----.. code:: shell from graphql.parser import GraphQLParser parser = GraphQLParser() ast = parser.parse(""" query UserQuery { user(id: 4) { id name profilePic avatar: profilePic(width: 30, height: 30) } } """) print(ast)License-------MIT
